alert.note: Alert for La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Saguache County East of Continental Divide below 10000 Ft; Saguache County West of Continental Divide Below 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 15 at 2:26PM MDT until August 15 at 8:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: .Monsoonal moisture interacting with passing cold frontal boundary will produce numerous showers and thunderstorms, capable of heavy rainfall. ...FLOOD WATCH HAS BEEN ISSUED FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...The La Garita Mountains, western Saguache, and western Las Animas Counties. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Monsoonal moisture interacting with passing cold frontal boundary will produce numerous showers and thunderstorms, capable of heavy rainfall. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Saguache County East of Continental Divide below 10000 Ft; Saguache County West of Continental Divide Below 10000 Ft
